author.name: Licensed by Woolworths  ©️ Dorling Kindersley Ltd

description: These fabulous tiger prawns are marinated in a fusion of Thai flavours that can be prepared up to three hours before serving.
name: Tangy Thai Prawn Skewers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 red chilli, seeded and finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Pat the prawns dry with kitchen paper. Combine prawns, garlic, ginger, chilli, sugar, sauce, and lime juice in a nonmetallic bowl. Cover and refrigerate for 1 hour.
Skewer 1 prawn on to each skewer. Serve chilled.
